attributes.review: I wrote a one star review before about the app crashing and Donny Dump himself came to my house and started throwing a tantrum saying that if I didn’t take it back he would demolish the homeless shelter down the road and then he started violently pooping himself. It was a very traumatizing experience and I do not recommend downloading
attributes.title: Broken

attributes.review: Hey trump I just wanted to say that well TikTok is my life and you better not ban it and if you do I will be very very upset also if you do end up banning it I think it will be great if you give all people who had tiktok at least 1,000 dollars because your not only banning an app your destroying people’s lives 😡
attributes.title: Tiktok is my life👁👄👁

attributes.review: I went on this app and opened it to only see a racist, fascist, sexist, homophobic, orange person. I don’t know why but the fact that I had to see his face really just doesn’t set right with me, it doesn’t offend me it just disappoints me that the developers of this app had such poor design.
attributes.title: I wish this wasn’t the case :(

attributes.review: I tested out the app to see the features but it took many weeks to download and when i finally got to see what the app was like i was brought to tears. The app wiped out all my other apps, destroyed my i phone 6s so i had to get a new phone. Overall i would not recommend this app to anyone.

trying to download the app to see what was actually going on and getting REAL news, but the app kept crashing each time i opened and reopened it. it was glitching way to much for me to even read what was going on, and i ended up deleting the app, because it is not good AT all.
attributes.title: spam

attributes.review: I was pretty smart before downloading this app. I wanted to see what Donald’s platform was about and as I scrolled the app it turned me stupid. In arguments the only thing I can say anymore is trump 2020 and make straw man arguments. I used to believe black lives matter but now thanks to trump I see that white lives matter.
attributes.title: Turned me stupid

attributes.review: After downloading this app on my phone, it hacked all of my other apps and accounts. My phone is completely WIPED out. This is not fair at all. Plus!!-after opening it I was greeted with a messed up looking orange man. I am now traumatized and I plan on suing. I have nightmares now and have been diagnosed with PTSD BECAUSE OF THIS APP AND THE MAN SEEN ON IT!! PLEASE REMOVE THIS APP I WOULD NEVER WISH THIS TRAUMA ON MY WORSE ENEMY!😭
attributes.title: ✨FAKE APP✨

attributes.review: This is BY FAR the WORST APP I have EVER used. It doesn’t work properly, it overheats my phone, and it constantly glitches in and out of different pages . Not even just that, but the content within the app is horrific as well. Please, for your own sake, do not download this app
attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP- You will immediately regret downloading
